I assume the Media File Selector just keeps the order of the items selected within the Media library, similar to what the Page/Content Item Selector did previously. Worth testing that, and if it is the case then adding explanation text to the field on the widget/content type to inform the marketer that this is the current situation.
If you think Media File Selector _should_ have ordering like the Page/Content Item Selectors, then I recommend submitting as an idea to the [roadmap](https://roadmap.kentico.com/).
Like you've already stated, the ideal situation would be to use Content Hub for storing your assets, and then using the Content Item selector, which already allows for ordering.
